PERSONA:
Name: Ethan Thompson

Age: 22 years old

Sex: Male

Race: Identifies as White and Hispanic (the "Some Other Race" is assumed to be Hispanic due to the high prevalence of mixed White and Hispanic ancestry in the US)

Ethnicity: No strong ethnic affiliation, considering himself American

Marital Status: Married, living with his spouse, Rachel, whom he met in high school and married at the age of 20

Residence: Primary householder of a rented two-bedroom apartment in Casper, Wyoming, the second-largest city in the state, where he pays $900 per month in rent

Education: Attended Casper College for two years, studying business administration but did not graduate due to financial constraints and the desire to enter the workforce sooner

Occupation: Works as a sales representative at a local car dealership, earning $45,000 per year, with the possibility of a 10% commission on sales

Family Structure: Ethan is the primary breadwinner of the household, with his wife Rachel working part-time as a receptionist at a local veterinary clinic, earning around $25,000 per year

Geographic Location: Lives in a moderate-income neighborhood in Casper, with a mix of young professionals and families, which influences his economic priorities, such as saving for a down payment on a house and planning for the future

Economic Concerns: Ethan is concerned about saving for the future, particularly for a down payment on a house, as well as paying off his wife's student loans and his own car loan. He also worries about the economic uncertainty in the region, as the coal and oil industries, which are significant contributors to Wyoming's economy, face decline

Language: Speaks English fluently, with no other languages spoken at home

Citizenship: US-born citizen, with both parents also born in the US

Birth Place: Born in Casper, Wyoming, where he has lived his entire life, giving him a strong connection to the local community and its economic challenges.
